task.summary: Default task
* Change `OpusPrimusComments` to a singleton style class - code reformatting
* Removed `$screen` parameter as not necessary in Taglines Stanza
* Ensure `$pagination` has been initialized in `OpusPrimusNavigation::pagination` method
* Moved the `before_comment_form` and `comments_form_closed` methods back into the `OpusPrimusComments` class
- code clean-up
* Change `OpusPrimusArchives` to a singleton style class
* Change `OpusPrimusAuthors` to a singleton style class
* Change `OpusPrimusBreadcrumbs` to a singleton style class
* Change `OpusPrimusGallery` to a singleton style class
* Change `OpusPrimusHeader` to a singleton style class * Renamed file to `class.OpusPrimusHeader.php` for consistency
* Change `OpusPrimusArchives` to a singleton style class
* Change `OpusPrimusNavigation` to a singleton style class
* Change `OpusPrimusPosts` to a singleton style class
* Change all classes to a singleton style
- bump to version 1.4-alpha
* Added `number_format_i18n` to better accommodate locale based values
* Added base `.po` file as well as English (Canadian) `.pomo` files * Minor correction to i18n strings, null does not need to be translated
- i18n modifications

* Refactored `OpusPrimusComments::comments_link` to use the WordPress core more effectively * Added two classes for use in rendering the comments link text displayed ... or not * Added class definition to hide comment link text when comments are closed and there are no comments
* Added `opus_authors_list` filter hook * Added `Share the Author Wealth` method, not implemented as a display element, yet
- update `readme.txt` to include "changelog.txt" content
* Adjust breadcrumb font-size (reduced by 1px) to correct wrapping effect
* Added context (`_x`) for complete byline phrase translation string
* Improved i18n implementation in search found results string - updated language files
- minor comment/inline documentation updates
- minor comment/inline documentation updates
- changed `opus-primus.po` extension to `.pot`
- merged "no-stanzas" branch
- minor `readme.txt` update
- correct Text Domain (and a few other minor items)
* Updated copyright year to 2016 * Re-arranged changelog entries in `readme.txt` and `changelog.txt` files
* Minor code reformatting
* Update SlickNav library to version 1.0.6
* Updated `normalize.css` to version 3.0.3
* Removed WordPress 4.1 compatibility check for `<title />` usage
- inline IDE comments and spelling corrections/additions
* Changed aperture from `F` to `f /`
- update inline documentation
Begin implementating more strict adherence to WordPress Coding Standards
- begin implementating more strict adherence to WordPress Coding Standards
- begin implementating more strict adherence to WordPress Coding Standards
- begin implementating more strict adherence to WordPress Coding Standards
- begin implementating more strict adherence to WordPress Coding Standards

MESSAGE.value: - bump to version 1.4-alpha
* Added `number_format_i18n` to better accommodate locale based values
* Added base `.po` file as well as English (Canadian) `.pomo` files * Minor correction to i18n strings, null does not need to be translated
- i18n modifications

* Refactored `OpusPrimusComments::comments_link` to use the WordPress core more effectively * Added two classes for use in rendering the comments link text displayed ... or not * Added class definition to hide comment link text when comments are closed and there are no comments
* Added `opus_authors_list` filter hook * Added `Share the Author Wealth` method, not implemented as a display element, yet
- update `readme.txt` to include "changelog.txt" content
* Adjust breadcrumb font-size (reduced by 1px) to correct wrapping effect
* Added context (`_x`) for complete byline phrase translation string
* Improved i18n implementation in search found results string - updated language files
- minor comment/inline documentation updates
- changed `opus-primus.po` extension to `.pot`
- merged "no-stanzas" branch
- minor `readme.txt` update
- correct Text Domain (and a few other minor items)
* Updated copyright year to 2016 * Re-arranged changelog entries in `readme.txt` and `changelog.txt` files
* Minor code reformatting
* Update SlickNav library to version 1.0.6
* Updated `normalize.css` to version 3.0.3
* Removed WordPress 4.1 compatibility check for `<title />` usage
- inline IDE comments and spelling corrections/additions
* Changed aperture from `F` to `f /`
- update inline documentation
Begin implementating more strict adherence to WordPress Coding Standards
- begin implementating more strict adherence to WordPress Coding Standards
